title: Gazabad, Qaleh Ganj
text: Gazabad (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Gazābād) is a village in <a href="Sorkh%20Qaleh%20Rural%20District">Sorkh Qaleh Rural District</a>, in the <a href="Central%20District%20%28Qaleh%20Ganj%20County%29">Central District</a> of <a href="Qaleh%20Ganj%20County">Qaleh Ganj County</a>, <a href="Kerman%20Province">Kerman Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 120, in 30 families.
